Grants were canceled to institutions like Harvard and Stanford for research projects in Africa even though Google's senior management had approved them and they lacked only a final signature on the contracts. That may be the way things are done in business, but it's not how grants are made in the nonprofit world, said the former Google.org executive. ''It was embarrassing.'' . China can help ease imbalances by raising the value of its currency, Olivier Blanchard said. The U.S. and other countries charge that China keeps its currency artificially low to maintain an export advantage. China is moving in the right direction and focusing increasingly on domestic demand, but we think it can be done faster, he said. a radio talk show host, Mike Pence started a TV show in 1995. Although Mike Pence was inspired by Rush Limbaugh , he kept to his ''no personal attacks'' pledge. Conservative media, including Rush Limbaugh , have a tremendous blind spot when it comes to making a distinction between differences in public policy and personal differences, Mike Pence told The Indianapolis Star in 1995.
